title: Liam Hemsworth ‘taking it slow’ with Maddison Brown after Miley Cyrus split
text:
Liam’s not rushing into anything (Picture: Getty)

Liam Hemsworth is said to be ‘taking it slow’ with his new beau, Maddison Brown, following his split from Miley Cyrus.

The Hunger Games star, who split from the singer after 10 years together back in August, is reportedly making sure he doesn’t rush into anything.

He’s currently said to be dating Dynasty actress Maddison, with the pair looking smitten as they held hands in New York City.

‘It’s very new,’ a source said, before adding to PEOPLE: ‘Liam is taking it slow but he’s definitely interested in her.’

Following the split, Liam headed home to Byron Bay in Australia, before being pictured in NYC with the 22-year-old actress.

The Hunger Games star was also seen dining at Sant Ambroeus with his date, with the pair sitting outside and enjoying drinks.

Liam and Miley split back in August (Picture: Getty Images)

However, it doesn’t look like there will be any bad blood between her and the Slide Away singer, after it was revealed that Maddison is actually a fan of Miley’s.

Months before the new couple were photographed together – and back when he was still married to his now-ex – Maddison liked a tweet from the singer, revealing she’s a fan.

Taking to Twitter on 11 April, Miley shared a photo of herself as Hannah Montana, paying tribute to the character. ‘Happy Anniversary to this queen,’ she wrote, alongside ‘#HMTHEMOVIE,’ with Maddison giving the snap a cheeky like.

Liam and Miley split back in August, 10 years after they first met and just eight months after they tied the knot.

He’s been moving on with actress Maddison Brown (Picture: WireImage for Witchery)

The 26-year-old sent the world into total meltdown after she passionately kissed Kaitlynn Carter, while on a trip to Lake Como, in Italy.

Shortly after, her reps confirmed her split from Chris Hemsworth’s brother, with a statement reading: ‘Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time.

‘Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is what’s best while they both focus on themselves and careers.

‘They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart. Please respect their process and privacy.’

Since, Miley’s been spotted kissing Cody Simpson, demanding that people leave her to have ‘a kiss and an acai bowl’ in peace.
